Text: Toryumon (闘龍門 , Tōryūmon ) is a professional wrestling promotion that operated in Japan until 2004 and in Mexico, where it's called Toryumon Mexico.

Text: Toryumon (Último Dragón):  Tōryūmon is a coined word that means "Fighting Dragon Gate".

Text: Toryumon (Último Dragón):  The word is coined after the homonym 登龍門 (Tōryūmon ) that literally means "climbing up dragon gate" and means "gateway to success".
